file_content.text: You sure cleared a path out there. That's good... but it's bad, too.
We must keep going. I'll be right behind you.
Each time a pawn's killed, Vitiate gets a little bit stronger. Not as much as when they kill, but.... That's what Minister Beniko says, anyway.
So we have to stop them without killing them.
Or we destroy Vitiate. Not that anyone seems to know how to do that....
Agent. Company.
Agent, we've got company.
Almost there....
Master Surro. The Sixth Line commander.
This one's my favorite so far. Even now, she struggles. You know, she's done some terrible things in the Republic's name.
This is between us. Let her go. Let them all go.
No more puppets.
If you have to manipulate others to get what you want, you've already lost.
I'm not impressed.
So... you, me.... Take over the galaxy together, have some laughs...? Come on, what do you think?
[Flirt] Wanna join forces?
There was a time I took pride in being your Wrath. Look at what you've become. You're just another madman.
I renounce you, monster.
The Dark Council supplanted your rule some time ago. You no longer have domain over the Empire or any of its worlds.
Your era has ended.
I'm the one you want. Release Master Surro and the others. You can have me.
Take me instead.
Whatever it takes, I'll see to it you never cause suffering ever again.
I will kill you.
Let her be. Let all of them go and stand here before me.
No more puppets. Face me.
For everything you have done to the galaxy and its people, you will pay the ultimate price.
I will kill you.
How about you give the Jedi a break? Come on out of there and say "hi."
Leave her alone.
Okay, so you can do some neat tricks and you've got a creepy way with words. Doesn't mean I'm going anywhere.
You don't scare me.
"Terrible things?" Who are you to judge?
What a hypocrite.
I think it's time you spoke for yourself--leave the Jedi and the rest out of it.
No more puppets.
The mighty Sith Emperor. So tough he never does his own fighting.
Fight me yourself, coward!
You would destroy the galaxy, and the Empire along with it. I won't let that happen.
You must be stopped.
I am your Wrath. Tell me what you wish for me, my Emperor, and I will do it.
I still serve you.
If it's a challenge you want, then try possessing me, Vitiate.
Give my will a try.
Imagine the power you and I could wield if we joined forces.
Let us rule together.
If you get what you want, you'll be doing away with all my paying customers. Can't let that happen.
You're bad for business.
Don't know if you're trying to scare me or impress me. If you're trying to bore me, then mission accomplished.
Yawn.
If you feel like you need a hand here, my rates are reasonable....
You hiring?
You do know I'm just the help, yes? I'm not the one you should be coming after.
I'm no one.
I suppose this visit of yours is meant to intimidate me. You'll have to try harder.
You don't scare me.
Madmen like you can't be allowed to reign. You have to be stopped.
You're a monster.
I like this one. Strong-willed. Not that it will save her--or anyone on this world.
Not your type, huh?
When this world turns to red and you choke on torrents of blood, remember that this was your chance to flee. A chance I... gave....
I would like you to put down your lightsaber, sit on your hands and wait for my hordes to arrive. Not what you had in mind, I suppose.
You are a blunt instrument. Your greatest achievement has been to bludgeon in my name. Any judgment you render is an amusement at best.
You will never have the power to destroy me. That you believe you could, it offends me.
Caution. Good. I had begun to think you might not have any sense whatsoever. Not that it will save you.
There is no... contemplation... there is only... duty....
We're wasting time here. The armory's safe. You go ahead. I'll be close behind.
Aagh!
No, I don't see the point. I would much prefer to watch you fail without any help from me.
I have no need of anything you have to offer me--save for your life.
The Empire is a failure. You can have it--not that you should expect it to last much longer.
Such bravery. But you must know you're completely powerless against me.
Humor in the face of death. The mark of a true coward.
I would wish you good luck, but there isn't enough of it.
A fair point. People of your stripe often struggle with naive moral dilemmas.
Again? No, I don't think so.
You overestimate your impact, Jedi.
Such fire--but you of all people must know you're out of your depths. You can't kill me.
Pass any judgment you like. They're all born of ignorance anyway.
Brave words, Jedi, but that won't be happening. Not today.
As much as you might want it, that simply isn't the way things are going to be, Jedi.
